channel.title: P2007Rs || "P2007Rs, the right rsps for the people that don't want to P2P."
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/300fbli.png[/img][/center] ________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ [center][b]"P2007Rs, the right rsps for the people that don't want to P2P."[/b][/center] ________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[center][size=18pt][b]P2007Rs Information:[/b][/size][/center]
P2007s [b]{ A.k.a Project 2006scape, Project 2006, Project Rs }[/b] is a F2P, non profit rsps, that will never shutdown, but a lot of downtime. We don't aim to be the best, but the server for you. With many updates and alot of things being added, we know this server will never have a feeling " i don't trust this server." We are proud we are doing this rsps. Were not the ones that accept rsgp donations or paypal and just walk away, were here to stay period. We will not get shutdown even if they make us, we will put up a fight. This is a professional 2007 Remake with 474 gameframe, and will have constant updates. Skills before May 30 2006, The rest is 2007 pure content. We will have Runescape Quests, but they will be custom and shorter, but similar. So please don't just walk away and say "oh, another fail remake." because this won't be a fail this will continue until the day i die, sincerely. This server will be the first of all remakes, that gets out of beta, because all remakes end at Beta... ________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080320193236/runescape/images/archive/3/37/20090906074416%21Lamp.png[/img][b]Minigames:[/b] Random Events None, will be added after skills are complete.
[b]Skills:[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img][b]Combat:[/b]
Degrading Barrows PvP fully complete PvN fully complete Perfect accuracy formula Equipment requirements Perfect max hit formulas Every Modern spell Every Ancient spell[Requested] Can't mage through walls All bow/arrows working Can't range through walls Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal) All bones bury-able All prayers working correctly Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img][b]Mining:[/b] Empty and refilling rocks All ore can be mined Correct pickaxe finding and animations Random chance of obtaining gems Correct re-spawn time Prospecting
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img][b]Smithing:[/b] All bars can be made All bars can be forged into items All equipment can be produced Correct animations, interfaces and objects used
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img][b]Fishing:[/b] All F2P fish can be cought All F2P fishing locations Correct animations Correct fishing locations
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img][b]Cooking:[/b] Bread Pizza Cake Dough making Meat Correct animation and timing used
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img][b]Woodcutting:[/b] All tree's cut-able Stumps & re-growing tree's Correct axe finding & animations
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img][b]Firemaking:[/b] All logs light-able Correct ground objects ( log while lighting & fire ) Correct animations
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img][b]Crafting:[/b] Leather making Tanning Spinning wool, Flax [My own custom bad easy way, but very fast.] Pottery (fired and un-fired items) Gem cutting Jewelry making
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img][b]Runecrafting:[/b] All altars working Correct multiple crafting Talismans "pull" to altars Tiaras
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img][b]All others P2P Skills:[/b] All complete except listed below. Agility[Just 92% Gnome Agility] Farming
[img]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img][b]Music:[/b] None. [I think it is useless many people don't even like it.]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img][b]Quests:[/b] Tutorial Island Cook's Assistant Others.
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080320193236/runescape/images/archive/3/37/20090906074416%21Lamp.png[/img][b]Misc:[/b] Pickables In-game Highscores Flour mill Working door's Working stairs Working ladders Working gate's
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b]Please Note:[/b]
This is merely a started beta, we been working hard on rewriting a lot of the packets to fit our needs. We are going to start checking every single skills that is on our skills tab. Not all information is accurate but what we viewed. For the music, nobody really listens to it, so we removed it and i forgot how to add it back.
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b]Media:[/b]
Will be posted in under 2 hours after created thread. Got to fix and add more content, or i will forget.

item.title: P2007Rs || "P2007Rs, the right rsps for the people that don't want to P2P."
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

[quote=“Driman Rune, post:39, topic:519800”]I ripped (crafting, and cooking from rune-server) the others were easy kinda to add, i spent a lot of time, like 10-14 hours a day coding, and my mind set on it. I didn’t know those 2, but i didn’t really ripped it, i changed some things like adding items, requirements(took kinda long).
And also, 2 skills were already good (Thieving and Smithing). They just needed like couple of minutes to work on.

Also, theirs a total of 16 skills. (non combat, except prayer).

EDIT: Not to forget, my teacher knows computer and gaming programming, he happened to know of Java. So he kind of helped me out with loops, conversions, public voids, and how to do all that, i like to thank him.[/quote] 10-14 hours seem abit excessive there… O.O
EDIT: Shit, i didn’t see the date there…

Read full topic

item.title: P2007Rs || "P2007Rs, the right rsps for the people that don't want to P2P."
item.dc:creator: @Driman_Rune Driman Rune
item.description:
@Driman_Rune wrote:

I ripped (crafting, and cooking from rune-server) the others were easy kinda to add, i spent a lot of time, like 10-14 hours a day coding, and my mind set on it. I didn’t know those 2, but i didn’t really ripped it, i changed some things like adding items, requirements(took kinda long).
And also, 2 skills were already good (Thieving and Smithing). They just needed like couple of minutes to work on.

Also, theirs a total of 16 skills. (non combat, except prayer).

EDIT: Not to forget, my teacher knows computer and gaming programming, he happened to know of Java. So he kind of helped me out with loops, conversions, public voids, and how to do all that, i like to thank him.

Read full topic

[/quote]

item.title: P2007Rs || "P2007Rs, the right rsps for the people that don't want to P2P."
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Mezzyscape562, post:28, topic:519800”][quote author=south-park link=topic=638294.msg4302924#msg4302924 date=1369278379]

Well i found this on server downloads by someone named ’ carlosathetruth ’ and i basically edited it a little added hyperion game engine and cyclehandler and added alot, but i am basically trying to fix what he added. And right now i am trying to fix some of the skills before starting on tut island again, but truthfully thats why theirs no media right now, i keep finding problems, but they will be up.

Your going to have to fix a few things in playerassistant before making tutorial island work. Also I would use a 474 hyperion for a 07 remake due to a PI being 317 protocol ( like 2006)
[/quote]
My little baby is growing up, using advanced words such as protocol :’) But yea I agree with South-Park, you will need to use a Hyperion because it’s really stable I highly recommend rs2-474 v2 as It has LOADS of content.[/quote]having LOADS of content is the exact reason why you shouldn’t use it really. When trying to make ultimate performance you have to build from ground up.

Read full topic
